metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13113 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libexif before 0.6.22. Use of uninitialized memory in EXIF Makernote handling could lead to crashes and potential use-after-free conditions.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13113` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-6ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-6ubuntu0.3').
